lejos.nxt.comm
Class NXTCommDevice

java.lang.Object
  lejos.nxt.comm.NXTCommDevice
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bluetooth, RS485, USB
public abstract class NXTCommDevice
extends Object

Base class for nxt communications devices. Provides a common address/name, plus utility functions.

Author:
andy
